id: Atlanta-area police officer shot and killed during suspicious vehicle check
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Deanna Hackney and Phil Gast, CNNUpdated 10:46 PM ET, Sat October 20, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)A police officer in Gwinnett County, Georgia, was shot and killed while answering a call about a suspicious vehicle on Saturday afternoon, according to a department spokesman.CNN's Steve Almasy contributed to this report.
